mapper.select: select a.course_cd , a.org_cd , b.org_nm , a.high_cls_cd , c.high_cls_nm , a.mid_cls_cd , d.mid_cls_nm , a.low_cls_cd , e.low_cls_nm , a.course_nm , a.edu_hour , a.reg_st_dt , a.reg_ed_dt , a.edu_st_dt , a.edu_ed_dt , a.edu_cost , a.loc , a.refund_yn , a.origin_img_file_nm , a.svr_img_file_nm , a.img_file_type from TB_IEP_EDU001M a, TB_IEP_ECD002M b, TB_IEP_ECD005M c, TB_IEP_ECD006M d, TB_IEP_ECD007M e where a.org_cd = b.org_cd and a.HIGH_CLS_CD = c.HIGH_CLS_CD and a.MID_CLS_CD = d.MID_CLS_CD and a.LOW_CLS_CD = e.LOW_CLS_CD and a.course_cd = #{course_cd}

SELECT COURSE_CD, HIGH_CLS_NM, MID_CLS_NM, LOW_CLS_NM, COURSE_NM, EDU_HOUR, REG_ST_DT, REG_ED_DT, EDU_ST_DT, EDU_ED_DT, EDU_COST, ORG_NM, LOC, REFUND_YN, DECODE(CONCAT('D-',REG_ED_DT - TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')),'D-0','D-Day',CONCAT('D-',REG_ED_DT - TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))) AS D_DAY FROM TB_IEP_ECD002M a, TB_IEP_EDU001M b, TB_IEP_ECD005M c, TB_IEP_ECD006M d, TB_IEP_ECD007M e WHERE c.HIGH_CLS_CD = b.HIGH_CLS_CD AND d.MID_CLS_CD = b.MID_CLS_CD AND e.LOW_CLS_CD = b.LOW_CLS_CD AND a.ORG_CD = b.ORG_CD AND (REG_ST_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND REG_ED_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))

SELECT COURSE_CD, HIGH_CLS_NM, MID_CLS_NM, LOW_CLS_NM, COURSE_NM, EDU_HOUR, REG_ST_DT, REG_ED_DT, EDU_ST_DT, EDU_ED_DT, EDU_COST, ORG_NM, LOC, REFUND_YN FROM TB_IEP_ECD002M a, TB_IEP_EDU001M b, TB_IEP_ECD005M c, TB_IEP_ECD006M d, TB_IEP_ECD007M e WHERE c.HIGH_CLS_CD = b.HIGH_CLS_CD AND d.MID_CLS_CD = b.MID_CLS_CD AND e.LOW_CLS_CD = b.LOW_CLS_CD AND a.ORG_CD = b.ORG_CD AND SUBSTR(EDU_ST_DT,1,6) = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,2),'YYYYMM')

select TRUNC(TO_DATE(REG_ED_DT, 'yyyymmdd') - SYSDATE, 0) as dday , a.course_cd, b.org_nm, a.course_nm, a.edu_st_dt, a.edu_ed_dt, a.svr_img_file_nm, a.img_file_type from tb_iep_edu001m a,TB_IEP_ECD002M b where a.org_cd = b.org_cd and sysdate >= a.REG_ST_DT and sysdate <= a.reg_ed_dt and TRUNC(TO_DATE(REG_ED_DT, 'yyyymmdd') - SYSDATE, 0) < 7 order by dday

select rownum, course_cd, org_nm, course_nm, edu_st_dt, edu_ed_dt, svr_img_file_nm, img_file_type from (select course_cd, org_nm, course_nm, edu_st_dt, edu_ed_dt,svr_img_file_nm,img_file_type, count(emn) from (select c.emn, a.course_cd, b.org_nm, a.course_nm, a.edu_st_dt, a.edu_ed_dt, a.svr_img_file_nm, a.img_file_type from tb_iep_edu001m a,TB_IEP_ECD002M b,TB_IEP_EDU002R c where a.org_cd = b.org_cd (+) and a.course_cd = c.course_cd (+) and sysdate >= a.REG_ST_DT and sysdate <= a.reg_ed_dt) group by course_cd, org_nm, course_nm, edu_st_dt, edu_ed_dt,svr_img_file_nm,img_file_type order by count(emn) desc) where rownum < 9

select a.course_cd, a.high_cls_cd, a.mid_cls_cd, a.low_cls_cd, b.org_nm, a.course_nm, a.edu_st_dt, a.edu_ed_dt,a.svr_img_file_nm,a.img_file_type from tb_iep_edu001m a,TB_IEP_ECD002M b where a.org_cd = b.org_cd and sysdate >= a.REG_ST_DT and sysdate <= a.reg_ed_dt and high_cls_cd = '1' and rownum <5
union all
select a.course_cd, a.high_cls_cd, a.mid_cls_cd, a.low_cls_cd, b.org_nm, a.course_nm, a.edu_st_dt, a.edu_ed_dt,a.svr_img_file_nm,a.img_file_type from tb_iep_edu001m a,TB_IEP_ECD002M b where a.org_cd = b.org_cd and sysdate >= a.REG_ST_DT and sysdate <= a.reg_ed_dt and high_cls_cd = '2' and rownum <5
union all
select a.course_cd, a.high_cls_cd, a.mid_cls_cd, a.low_cls_cd, b.org_nm, a.course_nm, a.edu_st_dt, a.edu_ed_dt,a.svr_img_file_nm,a.img_file_type from tb_iep_edu001m a,TB_IEP_ECD002M b where a.org_cd = b.org_cd and sysdate >= a.REG_ST_DT and sysdate <= a.reg_ed_dt and high_cls_cd = '3' and rownum <5

SELECT ROWNUM , COURSE_CD , ORG_NM , HIGH_CLS_NM , MID_CLS_NM , LOW_CLS_NM , COURSE_NM , EDU_ST_DT , EDU_ED_DT , EDU_COST FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_IEP_EDU001M EDU , TB_IEP_ECD002M ORG , TB_IEP_ECD005M HIGH_C , TB_IEP_ECD006M MID_C , TB_IEP_ECD007M LOW_C WHERE EDU.ORG_CD = ORG.ORG_CD AND EDU.HIGH_CLS_CD = HIGH_C.HIGH_CLS_CD AND EDU.MID_CLS_CD = MID_C.MID_CLS_CD AND EDU.LOW_CLS_CD = LOW_C.LOW_CLS_CD ORDER BY EDU.COURSE_CD DESC )
